text: Remission is either the disappearance or lowering signs and symptoms of a disease, usually used with cancer. A remission may be considered a partial remission or a complete remission. But even with complete remission, some signs of the disease also persist. Remission can be accompanied by asymptomatic carrier. == Related pages == * Cancer * HIV/AIDS * Diabetes ==References== Remission
title: Remission (medicine)
